TEXT.English: The [COLOR_PROJECT_TEXT]Apollo Program[COLOR_REVERT] is required to create the [COLOR_PROJECT_TEXT]SS Cockpit[COLOR_REVERT], [COLOR_PROJECT_TEXT]SS Life Support[COLOR_REVERT], [COLOR_PROJECT_TEXT]SS Stasis Chamber[COLOR_REVERT], [COLOR_PROJECT_TEXT]SS Docking Bay[COLOR_REVERT], [COLOR_PROJECT_TEXT]SS Engines[COLOR_REVERT], [COLOR_PROJECT_TEXT]SS Casings[COLOR_REVERT] and [COLOR_PROJECT_TEXT]SS Thrusters[COLOR_REVERT].
TEXT.Chinese: The [COLOR_PROJECT_TEXT]Apollo Program[COLOR_REVERT] is required to create the [COLOR_PROJECT_TEXT]SS Cockpit[COLOR_REVERT], [COLOR_PROJECT_TEXT]SS Life Support[COLOR_REVERT], [COLOR_PROJECT_TEXT]SS Stasis Chamber[COLOR_REVERT], [COLOR_PROJECT_TEXT]SS Docking Bay[COLOR_REVERT], [COLOR_PROJECT_TEXT]SS Engines[COLOR_REVERT], [COLOR_PROJECT_TEXT]SS Casings[COLOR_REVERT] and [COLOR_PROJECT_TEXT]SS Thrusters[COLOR_REVERT].

TEXT.English: [ICON_BULLET]Removes one non-state religion from this city[NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET]Causes temporary disorder and unhappiness
TEXT.Chinese: [ICON_BULLET]从这座城市中移除非官方宗教[NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET]这将导致叛乱和不满

TEXT.English: The [COLOR_PROJECT_TEXT]Manhattan Project[COLOR_REVERT] is required to create [COLOR_PROJECT_TEXT]SDI[COLOR_REVERT]. It also allows you to construct [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]ICBMs[COLOR_REVERT], [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]Tactical Nukes[COLOR_REVERT] and [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Bomb Shelters[COLOR_REVERT].
TEXT.Chinese: The [COLOR_PROJECT_TEXT]Manhattan Project[COLOR_REVERT] is required to create [COLOR_PROJECT_TEXT]SDI[COLOR_REVERT]. It also allows you to construct [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]ICBMs[COLOR_REVERT], [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]Tactical Nukes[COLOR_REVERT] and [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Bomb Shelters[COLOR_REVERT].

TEXT.English: [COLOR_PROJECT_TEXT]SDI[COLOR_REVERT] gives a fifty percent chance of intercepting nukes.
TEXT.Chinese: [COLOR_PROJECT_TEXT]SDI[COLOR_REVERT] gives a fifty percent chance of intercepting nukes.

TEXT.English: [COLOR_PROJECT_TEXT]SS Casings[COLOR_REVERT] are required to achieve the [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Space Race[COLOR_REVERT] victory condition. Increases the chance of a successful mission for the spaceship.
TEXT.Chinese: [COLOR_PROJECT_TEXT]SS Casings[COLOR_REVERT] are required to achieve the [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Space Race[COLOR_REVERT] victory condition. Increases the chance of a successful mission for the spaceship.
